entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
